title: Futbol Americas: Pulisic to blame for lack of Chelsea minutes?
description:
On Monday's episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Sebastian Salazar react to Christian Pulisic's second consecutive game without any minutes. Is Pulisic to blame? With NYRB and Nashville eliminated, is it something, nothing or everything that Berhalter's top center backs will be without any competitive action until November 21st? Next, the guys react to the Liga MX, MLS and NWSL playoffs.
